functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Phantom Blade Scroll, Class 3\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"The benefits of stashing items in","color":"gray"}','{"text":"alternate spaces are many, but this","color":"gray"}','{"text":"scroll is the only useful result of","color":"gray"}','{"text":"that work; The retrieved blades are","color":"gray"}','{"text":"phantasmal, and quickly return to the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"places they were stored.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Conjure a Temporary Phantasmal Blade","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Blade Strikes Influence Successive Conjurations","color":"gray"}']},HoldingID:77,Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:6,CustomModelData:41,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUID:[I;-208048255,1742226236,-1647861675,1119686910],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
